display.title: Infinity Wand
display.description:
Places multiple blocks at once! Max tier, infinite durability. Block range of 1024.

To undo: Holding down SHIFT+CTRL while looking at a blocks will show you the last blocks you placed with a green border around them. SHIFT+CTRL+Right clicking any of them will undo the operation, giving you all the items back. If you used the Destruction core, it will restore the blocks.
